hymn.title: Thou art the living Word, O Lord

lyrics.stanza: Thou art the living Word, O Lord, Which ever was with God; His glory Thou hast fully shown When Thou on earth hast trod.
We praise Thee, O Thou living Word, For God in Thee we see; His glory and His character Are all revealed by Thee.
The heavens do God's glory speak, Creation vast doth show The things of God, His character And pow'r for man to know.
The Word of God—how rich, profound, His testimony shown; Within the Word Thou art declared, That God should be made known.
Thou, living Word, didst flesh become, With man on earth hast trod; And all Thy words and conduct here Expression gave to God.
O living Word, Thou art the life, Thou art the living light; As life Thou dost illuminate The Father to our sight.
God's judgment Thou wilt yet perform, His righteousness make known; This also doth expression give That God be fully shown.
God's full expression, Lord, Thou art, Himself Thou hast revealed; Declaring all He is to man, No more is God concealed.
